participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ksads_pd_raw_1756_p.Description: Over the past 2 weeks, how often has your child worried about having another attack, or about something bad happening because of the attacks? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_pd_raw_1757_p.Description: In the past two weeks, how often has your child not gone out, gone out less often, or done anything else differently because of the attacks? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_pd_raw_1759_p.Description: Are the attacks related to drug use? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_pd_raw_1755_p.Description: Before you said your child sometimes has panic attacks, where for no reason he or she suddenly feel super scared, like they are having a heart attack. When your child has panic attacks, does he or she experience any of the following?Fear of losing control | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_pd_raw_1774_p.Description: After your child's first attack, or after your child's first few attacks, did he or she worry about having another attack, or about something bad happening because of the attacks? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_pd_raw_1775_p.Description: After your child's first attack, or after your child's first few attacks, did he or she stop going out or go out less often, or do anything else differently because of them? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_pd_raw_1777_p.Description: Were the attacks related to drug use? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_pd_raw_1778_p.Description: For how long did your child have panic attacks back then? Please enter weeks, months, or years.

ksads_pd_raw_1754_p.Description: Before you said your child sometimes has panic attacks, where for no reason he or she suddenly feel super scared, like they are having a heart attack. When your child has panic attacks, does he or she experience any of the following?Fear of dying | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_pd_raw_176_p.Description: In the past two weeks, has your child had any panic attacks where for no reason at all he or she suddenly felt super scared and like he or she was having a heart attack? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_pd_raw_178_p.Description: Was there ever a time that your child had a lot of panic attacks? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_pd_raw_179_p.Description: Was there ever another time that your child had a lot of panic attacks? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_pd_raw_180_p.Description: When was that? If this happened more than once, think of the time that was the worst.
